description: The CASE_MGMT table is the master table for reporting on case data. This table includes foreign keys to other tables containing information about the case, such as employer, coverage, and diagnosis information.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the case record.

columns.name: CASE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the case.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient linked to the case record.

columns.name: CASE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value assigned to classify the case record and determine default case priorities.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CASE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the status of the case.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New


Open


Re-Opened


Closed

columns.name: PRIORITY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the priority record assigned to the case.

columns.name: PRIORITY_ID_PRIORITY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the priority record.

columns.name: MANAGER_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who is assigned this case.

columns.name: ROSTER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the roster to which this case belongs.

columns.name: ROSTER_ID_ROSTER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the roster.

columns.name: RAW_BD_ADJST
columns.description: The manual adjustment to the case�s total number of raw days.

columns.name: CONV_BD_ADJST
columns.description: The manual adjustment to the case�s total number of converted days.

columns.name: RAW_RFL_BD_TOT
columns.description: The sum of raw bed days for all the referrals linked to the case.

columns.name: CONV_RFL_BD_TOT
columns.description: The sum of converted bed days for all the referrals linked to the case.

columns.name: CASE_RAW_TOTAL
columns.description: The sum of raw bed days for all the referrals linked to the case and any adjustments entered for raw days.

columns.name: TOTAL_COST_OF_CASE
columns.description: The dollar amount representing the sum of the claims, charges and adjustments linked to this case.

columns.name: DATE_REPORTED
columns.description: The date the accident was reported.

columns.name: DAYS_OF_TREATMENT
columns.description: The number of days of treatment that the patient underwent as a result of the injury.

columns.name: HOURS_ON_CASE
columns.description: The hours spent by the cost tracking manager on the case.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the carrier record linked to this case record.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_ID
columns.description: This is the unique ID of the employer record linked to this case record if Patient Employer Linked Free Text or Linked to Employer(I EAF 6410) is set to 1. This is free text if I EAF 6410 is set to 2.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_ID_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer.

columns.name: ACCIDENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value assigned to the case record to explain the type of accident that resulted in the creation of this case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INJURY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value assigned to the case record to explain the type of injury arising out of the accident.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INJURY_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient was injured.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date the patient started treatment for the injury.

columns.name: WORK_DAYS_MISSED
columns.description: The number of days of work missed by the patient.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_LOCATION
columns.description: The free text describing the location from which the patient is released after treatment.

columns.name: CLASSIFIER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the classifier record that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: CLASSIFIER_ID_CLASSIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The title of the classifier record.

columns.name: TRG_DIAGNOSIS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis record (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_DIAG_COMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis component record (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_DIAG_COMP_ID_COMPONENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component

columns.name: TRG_PROCEDURE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_PROC_COMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure component (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_PROC_COMP_ID_COMPONENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component

columns.name: TRG_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payor (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: TRG_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the benefit plan (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: LOB_ID
columns.description: The case line of business.

columns.name: LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: TRG_MIN_AGE
columns.description: The minimum age threshold set in the case classifier that generated the case create message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_MAX_AGE
columns.description: The maximum age threshold set in the case management classifier that generated the case create message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Referred To Provider or the Claim's Associated Physician's Provider (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The specialty of the provider (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TRG_POS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the place of service or location  (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_LOB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Line of Business (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: TRG_PRIM_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Patient's Primary Location (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: ESCALATION_DATE
columns.description: The escalation date of the case.

columns.name: EOW_MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The In Basket message ID for the case.

columns.name: EOW_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The In Basket message status for the case.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Message


Normal Due Message


Escalated Due Message

columns.name: CASE_CONV_TOTAL
columns.description: Case level converted bed days total.

columns.name: TRG_REVCODE_ID
columns.description: Displays the revenue code matched in a case classifier, resulting in a case create In Basket message. The associated case was created from this In Basket message.

columns.name: TRG_REVCODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: TRG_REV_COMP_ID
columns.description: Displays the revenue code component matched in a case classifier, resulting in a case created In Basket message. The associated case was created from this In Basket message.

columns.name: TRG_REV_COMP_ID_COMPONENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component

columns.name: TRG_COMPON_GRP_ID
columns.description: Specifies the trigger component group.

columns.name: TRG_COMPON_GRP_ID_COMPONENT_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component group

columns.name: TRG_ICD_PX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the ICD Procedure Code (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_ICD_PX_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.

columns.name: TRG_APPLY_TO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specify whether this case should apply to referrals, AP claims or both. The default (blank value) is referrals.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Referrals


AP Claims


Both Referrals and AP Claims

columns.name: TRG_RFL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of referral (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TRG_DRG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: TRG_DRG_COMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) component (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TRG_DRG_COMP_ID_COMPONENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component

columns.name: TRG_CVG_PRIM_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage primary location (if any) that triggered the case creation message for this case.

columns.name: TIME_OF_TREATMENT_TM
columns.description: Holds the time of treatment for accident information.

columns.name: WORK_COMP_CLAIM_NUM
columns.description: Workers' compensation claim number associated with the case.

columns.name: WORK_COMP_CARRIER
columns.description: Workers' compensation carrier associated with the case.

columns.name: TPA_ADMINISTRATOR
columns.description: Name of the third party administrator.
